title: 1899 Harvey Bailey Boston Beaneaters Chickering Cabinet
author: sb1

posts.post_title: 1899 Harvey Bailey Boston Beaneaters Chickering Cabinet
posts.post_content:
1899 Elmer Chickering Imperial Cabinet of Harvey F. Bailey, Boston Beaneaters Pitcher. A cabinet from the Jouett Meekin family find sold by Lew Lipset many years ago. Presumably, produced only for the players(which, as no others were known prior or discovered since. Measures 7 7/8" X 10".

This is the only image for Bailey, seen to date.

$5,500 check, MO or Zelle.

Scott
